metadata.title: CVE-2014-0249 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The System Security Services Daemon (SSSD) 1.11.6 does not properlyidentify group membership when a non-POSIX group is in a group membershipchain, which allows local users to bypass access restrictions viaunspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: sssd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
